Replying to @calavera 2018-01-12 16:44
@calavera @Eiskis @Netlify @contentful I trigger lots of builds for one of my sites though @contentful. Although @Netlify's build scheduler is smart, my build notifications felt healthier after configuring Contentful to fire the build hooks only on publish events, instead of saves (which were after most keystrokes) https://t.co/MbtvcQPQbt
